aboutme: I'm a 22-year-old software engineering student currently specializing in web development. I completed my Bachelor's degree in IT in the University of Turku last summer with a minor in economics, and will continue working towards my Master's degree after I have finished my military service.
Apart from software engineering, my other interests currently include video games, 3D printing, and reading.

projects.title: Recipe Roller
projects.description: A CRUD-app for storing and viewing recipes.

projects.title: Fölitracker
projects.description: A demo app that uses the Föli open API to track buses in the Turku area.
